Weather Activity Recommendation API
  • API Reference
  • app
  • app.routes
  • app.routes.user
  • View page source

app.routes.user

Attributes

RESET_TOKEN

router

Functions

create_user(user)

Create a new user in the session store (does not modify the original JSON file).

delete_user(user_id)

Delete a user from the session store.

get_user(user_id)

Return a user by id from the JSON data file; raises 404 if not found.

reset_users([x_reset_token])

Reset the in-memory users store from app/data/users.json.

update_user(user_id, user)

Update an existing user in the session store.

Module Contents

app.routes.user.create_user(user: app.models.db.user.UserCreate)

Create a new user in the session store (does not modify the original JSON file).

app.routes.user.delete_user(user_id: int)

Delete a user from the session store.

app.routes.user.get_user(user_id: int)

Return a user by id from the JSON data file; raises 404 if not found.

app.routes.user.reset_users(x_reset_token: str | None = Header(None))

Reset the in-memory users store from app/data/users.json.

  • If RESET_TOKEN env var is set, request must include header x-reset-token with that value.

  • This does not modify the JSON file on disk; it only resets the in-memory session store.

app.routes.user.update_user(user_id: int, user: app.models.db.user.UserUpdate)

Update an existing user in the session store.

app.routes.user.RESET_TOKEN
app.routes.user.router
